alert.note: Alert for Anson; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Anson and southern Stanly Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midland, or 16 miles northeast of Monroe, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, heavy rain and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albemarle, Ansonville, Fairview In Union County, Locust, Norwood, Oakboro, Stanfield, Lake Tillery and Morrow Mountain State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
